snippet: With William M. Daley, a former White House chief of staff, dropping out, the most serious challenge to Pat Quinn, the Democratic incumbent, may come from the Republicans.
abstract: Democrat William M Daley, former White House chief of staff, drops out of race for Illinois governor, giving incumbent Pat Quinn a better shot at winning re-election.
lead_paragraph: With William M. Daley, a former White House chief of staff, dropping out, the most serious challenge to Pat Quinn, the Democratic incumbent, may come from the Republicans.

headline.main: Primary Field Clears Abruptly for Illinois Governor’s Bid
headline.print_headline: Primary Field Clears Abruptly for Illinois Governor’s Bid
